alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 06 at 9:49PM EDT until September 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Peace River At Arcadia at SR 70 affecting DeSoto County. Myakka River At Myakka River State Park affecting Sarasota County. For the Myakka...including Myakka River State Park...Minor flooding is forecast to continue. For the Peace...including Bartow, Zolfo Springs at SR 17, Arcadia at SR 70...Minor flooding is forecast to continue. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Peace River at Arcadia at SR 70. * WHEN...Until Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Girl Scout camp floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM EDT Wednesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Friday morning and continue falling to 8.1 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.1 feet on 07/06/2001. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 pm EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Peace River Arcadia at SR 7 11.0 12.1 Wed 9 pm 11.6 10.6 9.7 8.9 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 100 PM EDT.
